thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Euston Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Another Visit
thread.title_full: Another Visit - Review of Premier Inn London Euston Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: oldfathertime
title: Another Visit
text:
Stopped in this hotel in December 2015 and its still as good.
As we were off on a Eastern European backpacking tour it was a great place to start.
The hotel staff were helpful as always and the rooms clean and the Inn is only minutes from Euston Station and by booking early we got a very good bargain price.
Walked to Camden Lock which is a mile from the Premier Inn and visited the market and a good couple of hours soon passed away in an interesting location. Its like Brick Lane but with water.
